page.title: 14N. Baddersley Baptist Church
page.content: {North Baddersley Baptist Church}has been in existence since 1957. There has been a church on this site for about 90 years. The minister of the church is the Rev. Gerald Blunden. The church has a morning and evening service with about 80-100 people in the morning service on Sundays and about 30 people in the evening. On special occasions up to 130 people attend the services. A total of about 160 people can attend. The church building also holds activities which include the Red Cross. The church itself holds many activities including Sunday School, Fellowship, Prayer, and Bible Study. It also holds activities for young women. The church is involved in the local community as the minister visits peoplle who are ill and takes them out. He also visits the local junior schools.
